item.title: [pi] Custom NPCs
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

I just added a custom NPC that has “Talk-to” and “pickpocket” action
But the problem is when you talk to the npc it pickpockets the npc instead of talking to him
when you pickpocket the npc nothing happens…
How do i make it so when you “talk-to” the npc it talks to the npc
and when you pickpocket him he picks the pocket…

Here is what i have:

case 344: if (c.questPrize == 3 && c.clickedGate == true) { c.getThieving().stealKey(npcType); } else if (c.questPrize < 3) { c.sendMessage("You shouldn't do that."); }This is for the custom NPC when you click talk to it goes to this case… How would i make it so instead of going to this case it goes to “c.getDH().sendDialogues(4150, npcType);”

Read full topic
